text: nisid'dha masaniki badulu nisid'dha masame mariyu nisid'dha sthalalalo n'yaya pratikaram (khisas) tisukovaccu. Kabatti mipai evaraina dadi ceste, miru kuda varipai ade vidhanga dadi ceyandi. Mariyu allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Mariyu niscayanga, allah bhayabhaktulu galavariki toduga untadani telusukondi
